ValidationRule.description: 'Chain ID' field should be mandatory when the 'Status' of the 'Outlet Dispenser' is 'Assigned to outlet'...
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'BoE Dispenser', ISPICKVAL(FS_Status__c , 'Assigned to outlet') , ISBLANK(Chain_ID__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 'Chain ID' is mandatory when the 'Status' is 'Assigned to outlet'.
